categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: The Battle of Maraken took place at Maraken during the early stages of the Galactic Empire's reign. The Imperial officer Visler Korda lost his lower jaw to a combat droid during the battle, but was able to destroy the droid in turn. Consequently, he was fitted with a robotic jaw lined with sharp metal teeth.
The Battle of Maraken was mentioned on Cavan Scott's young adult book Adventures in Wild Space: The Snare.
According to the author, it did not take place during the Clone Wars, but rather the early Imperial period.
